txt.en:
'Dwarf!

'Why do you stand idle when you know what is demanded of you? Are you content to let the rest of your malformed kind bear these burdens for you? If that is so, the Dark Lord has little use for you. Away with you!'

<rgb=#FF0000>Completing this quest will give you access to the many features of the Eyes and Guard Tavern</rgb>
Skip the Introduction and gain access to the Eyes & Guard Tavern.
Speak with Núluzagar to bypass the Introduction
If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience, speak with Núluzagar again.
